item.title: Email Inbox Type
item.dc:creator: easyG
item.category: email inbox type priority important messages efficient
item.description: What's your email inbox type? Many people are uncomfortable with their inbox. Most use Outlook or Google mail. Both list messages in the order received, but there's a better way! http://easygapps.com/learn/priority-inbox
item.content:encoded:
What's your email inbox type?

Many people are uncomfortable with their inbox. Most use Outlook or Google mail. Both list messages in the order received, but there's a better way!

http://easygapps.com/learn/priority-inbox
